p: As anticipated, having a phosphatidylethanol level of less than 8 ng/mL and self-reporting complete abstinence in the past 3 weeks were strongly associated. At baseline, the odds ratio was 9.8 (95% CI, 2.3 to 40.9); at 3 months, 5.8 (95% CI, 2.9 to 11.6); and at 12 months, 6.4 (95% CI, 3.2 to 12.7) (eTable 10 in Supplement 2).
